message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_CASEREF_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Case Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_EXTERNALREF_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The External Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_CLIENT_FIRST_NAME_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Client First Name entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_CLIENT_LAST_NAME_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Client Last Name entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_CLIENT_REF_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Client Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_PAYEE_NAME_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Payee Name entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_PAYEE_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Payee Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_PROVIDER_NAME_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Provider Name entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_FV_PROVIDER_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_LT_OR_EQ
message.locale: The Provider Reference Number entered is too long (%1n), maximum allowed is %2n.

message.name: ERR_LINE_ITEM_FV_REFERENCE_NUMBER_EMPTY
message.locale: The Reference Number must be entered.

message.name: ERR_REQUEST_OF_TYPE_SERVICE_INVOICE_MUST_HAVE_SERVICE_INVOICE_LINE_ITEM
message.locale: A request of type 'Submit an Invoice' must have at least one 'Open' Service Invoice Request Line Item.

message.name: ERR_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_UNIQUE
message.locale: A Service Invoice Request with Reference Number %1s already exists.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNAL_REFERENCE_NUMBER_MUST_BE_VALID
message.locale: The External Reference Number must belong to either a Provider or Provider Group.

message.name: ERR_CANNOT_MODIFY_CANCELLED_RECORD
message.locale: This Request is '%1c', it cannot be modified.
